00163 static int is_socket(const char *file)
00164 {
00165         struct stat buf;
00166 
00167         stat(file, &buf);
00168         return (buf.st_mode&S_IFMT) == S_IFSOCK;
00169 }
00170 
00171 static int sock;
00172 #include <signal.h>
00173 #include <sys/time.h>
00174 #include <unistd.h>

00176 static int timed_out;
00177 
00178 static void alarm_handler(int signum) {
00179         //printf("alarm");
00180         timed_out = 1;
00181         fprintf(stderr, "ERROR:TIMEOUT\n");
00182         exit( -ETIMEDOUT );
00183 }
00184 
00185 
00186 static void install_handlers(void) {
00187         struct sigaction sa;
00188         memset(&sa, 0, sizeof(sa));
00189         sa.sa_handler = alarm_handler;
00190         if (sigaction(SIGALRM, &sa, NULL)) perror ("sigaction");
00191 /*
00192         struct sigaction sc;
00193         memset(&sc, 0, sizeof(sc));
00194         sc.sa_handler = ctrlc_handler;
00195         if (sigaction(SIGINT, &sc, NULL)) perror ("sigaction");
00196 */
00197 }

00200 static FILE* make_connection(const char *device)
00201 {
00202         FILE *fd = 0;
00203 
00204         if (is_socket(device)){
00205                 struct sockaddr_un addr;
00206 
00207                 size_t addrLength;
00208 
00209                 if ((sock = socket(PF_UNIX, SOCK_STREAM, 0)) < 0){
00210                         fprintf( stderr, "ERROR:failed to open socket\n");
00211                         _exit(errno);
00212                 }
00213                 addr.sun_family = AF_UNIX;
00214                 strcpy(addr.sun_path, device);
00215                 addrLength = sizeof(addr.sun_family) + strlen(addr.sun_path);
00216 
00217                 if (connect(sock, (struct sockaddr*)&addr, addrLength)){
00218                         fprintf( stderr, "ERROR connect failed \"%s\"\n",
00219                                  device );
00220                 }
00221 
00222                 fd = fdopen(sock, "r+");
00223                 if ( fd == NULL ){
00224                         fprintf( stderr, 
00225                                  "ERROR: failed hook socket \"%s\"\n", 
00226                                  device );
00227                         _exit(errno);
00228                 }
00229         }else{
00230                 fd = fopen( device, "r+" );
00231                 if ( fd == NULL ){
00232                         fprintf( stderr, 
00233                                  "ERROR: failed to open device \"%s\"\n", 
00234                                  device );
00235                         _exit(errno);
00236                 }
00237         }
00238 
00239         return fd;
00240 }

00243 
00244 int main( int argc, const char* argv[] )
00245 {
00246         char* device = getenv( ENV )? getenv( ENV ):FNAME;
00247         char devname_buffer[80];
00248         char* poll_while = 0;
00249         char* poll_until = 0;
00250         FILE* fd;
00251         int timeout = 0;
00252 
00253 
00254         int rc;
00255         int board;
00256         int poll = 0;
00257 
00258         struct poptOption opt_table[] = {
00259                 { "device",     'f', POPT_ARG_STRING, &device,     'f' },
00260                 { "board",      'b', POPT_ARG_INT,    &board,      'b' },
00261                 { "shell",      's', POPT_ARG_INT,    &board,      's' },
00262                 { "verbose",    'v', POPT_ARG_INT,    &verbose,    0   },
00263                 { "version",    0,   POPT_ARG_NONE,   0,           'V' },
00264                 { "while",      'w', POPT_ARG_STRING, &poll_while, 'p' },
00265                 { "until",      'u', POPT_ARG_STRING, &poll_until, 'p' },
00266                 { "timeout",    't', POPT_ARG_INT,    &timeout,    't',
00267                   "timeout in seconds"},
00268                 POPT_AUTOHELP
00269                 POPT_TABLEEND           
00270         };
00271 
00272         install_handlers();
00273 
00274         opt_context = poptGetContext( argv[0], argc, argv, opt_table, 0 );
00275 
00276         while ( (rc = poptGetNextOpt( opt_context )) > 0 ){
00277                 switch( rc ){
00278                 case 'V':
00279                         fprintf(stderr, HELP);
00280                         return 0;
00281                 case 'b':
00282                         device = devname_buffer;
00283                         sprintf( device, MFMT, board, board );
00284                         break;
00285                 case 's':
00286                         device = devname_buffer;
00287                         sprintf(device, SHELL_FMT, board);
00288                         break;
00289                 case 'p':
00290                         poll = 1;
00291                         break;
00292                 case 't':
00293                         alarm(timeout);
00294                         break;
00295                 }
00296         }  // processes all other opts via arg pointers
00297 
00298         if ( verbose > 1 ){
00299                 fprintf( stderr, "using device \"%s\"\n", device );
00300         }
00301 
00302         fd = make_connection(device);
00303 
00304         if ( STREQ( argv[0], "acqcmd-hold" ) ){
00305                 pause();                             // hold path until killed
00306                 return -1;
00307         }else if ( poll ) {
00308                 return do_poll( device, fd, poptGetArg( opt_context ), 
00309                                 poll_while, poll_until );
00310         }else if ( poptPeekArg( opt_context ) ){
00311                 PRINTF( "poptPeekArg() returns %p \"%s\"\n",
00312                         poptPeekArg( opt_context ),
00313                         poptPeekArg( opt_context )? 
00314                         poptPeekArg( opt_context ): "---");
00315                 return process_command( fd );
00316         }else{
00317                 return process_stdin( fd );
00318         }
00319 }
00320 
00321 #define ERROR_STRING    "ACQ32:ERROR"
00322 #define ERROR_LEN       strlen(ERROR_STRING)
00323 
00324 static int process_command( FILE* fd )
00325 {       
00326         char reply[80];
00327         const char* next_word;
00328         int nout;
00329         int err = 0;
00330 
00331         while( (next_word = poptGetArg( opt_context )) ){
00332                 fputs( next_word, fd );
00333                 fputs( " ", fd );
00334         }
00335 
00336         fputs( "\n", fd );
00337 
00338         for ( nout = 0; fgets( reply, sizeof(reply), fd ) != NULL; ++nout ){
00339                 if (strncmp(reply, ERROR_STRING, ERROR_LEN) == 0){
00340                         err = 1;
00341                 }
00342                 if (STREQ(reply, "EOF\n")){
00343                         break;
00344                 }
00345                 fputs( reply, stdout );
00346         }
00347 
00348         if ( nout == 0){
00349                 perror( "fgets() ret 0" );
00350                 return -1;
00351         }else{
00352                 return err;
00353         }
00354 }
00355 
00356 static int do_poll( 
00357         const char* device,
00358         FILE* fd, 
00359         const char* command, 
00360         const char* do_while, 
00361         const char* do_until )
00362 {       
00363         char reply[80];
00364         int success = -1;
00365 
00366         if( command == 0 ){
00367                 command = "getState";
00368         }
00369 
00370         PRINTF( "command \"%s\" while \"%s\" until \"%s\"\n",
00371                 command, 
00372                 do_while!=0? do_while: "any",
00373                 do_until!=0? do_until: "none" );
00374 
00375 
00376         if (sock){
00377                 fcntl(sock, F_SETFL, O_NONBLOCK);
00378         }
00379 /*
00380  * this is a complete and dirty hack 
00381  */
00382         while (1) {
00383                 int found_while = 0;
00384                 int found_until = 0;
00385 
00386                 PRINTF( "%s\n", command );
00387 
00388                 fputs( command, fd );
00389                 fputs( "\n", fd );
00390                 if (sock){
00391                         fflush(fd);
00392                 }
00393 
00394                 usleep(100*1000);
00395                 if ( verbose==1 ) fputs( ".", stdout );
00396 
00397 
00398                 do {
00399                         if (fgets( reply, sizeof(reply), fd ) == 0){
00400                                 switch(errno){
00401                                 case 0:
00402                                         break;
00403                                 case EWOULDBLOCK:
00404                                         usleep(100*1000);
00405                                         break;
00406                                 default:
00407                                         break;
00408                                 }
00409                         }
00410                         if ( verbose > 0 ){
00411                                 PRINTF( reply );
00412                         }
00413                         if ( do_while && strstr( reply, do_while ) ){
00414                                 found_while = 1;
00415                         }
00416                         if ( do_until && strstr( reply, do_until ) ){
00417                                 found_until = 1;
00418                         }
00419                         if (!sock){
00420                                 break;
00421                         }
00422                 }while (!strstr(reply, "EOF"));
00423 
00424                 if ( verbose==1 ) fputs( "+", stdout );
00425             
00426                 if ( found_until ){
00427                         PRINTF( "SUCCESS - found until\n" );
00428                         success = 0;
00429                         break;
00430                 }else if ( do_until==0 && !found_while ){
00431                         PRINTF( "SUCCESS2 - !while\n" );
00432                         success = 0;
00433                         break;
00434                 }else if ((do_while!=0 && found_while) || do_while==0){
00435                         if (!sock){
00437                                 PRINTF("reopen(%s)", device);
00438                                 fclose(fd);
00439                                 fd = make_connection(device);
00440                         }
00441                         continue;
00442                 }else{
00443                         perror( "while or until not found" );
00444                         break;
00445                 }
00446 
00447 
00448         }
00449 
00450 /*
00451         if (sock){
00452                 fcntl(sock, F_CLRFL, O_NONBLOCK);       
00453         }
00454 */
00455         return success;
00456 }

00458 #define ISCOMMENT( cl ) (cl[0]=='#')
00459 #define ISBLANK(cl)     (strlen(cl)<=1)
00460 
00461 static int iscontinuation(char *line)
00462 {
00463         int len = strlen(line);
00464 
00465         if (len > 1){
00466                 if (line[len-1] == '\n'){
00467                         switch(line[len-2]){
00468                         case '\\':
00469                         case ';':
00470                                 return 1;
00471                         }
00472                 }
00473         }
00474 
00475         return 0;
00476 }
00477 
00478 static int process_stdin( FILE* fd )
00479 {
00480         char* command_line = malloc(MAXLINE);
00481         char reply[80];
00482         int nout;
00483 
00484         while ( fgets( command_line, MAXLINE, stdin ) ){
00485                 PRINTF( command_line );
00486                 if ( !ISCOMMENT( command_line ) && !ISBLANK( command_line ) ){
00487                         fputs( command_line, fd );
00488 
00489                         if (iscontinuation(command_line)){
00490                                 continue;
00491                         }
00492                         for ( nout = 0; 
00493                               fgets( reply, sizeof(reply), fd )!=NULL; 
00494                               ++nout ){
00495                                 if (STREQ(reply, "EOF\n")){
00496                                         break;
00497                                 }
00498                                 fputs( reply, stdout );
00499                         }
00500 
00501                         if ( nout == 0){
00502                                 perror( "fgets() ret 0" );
00503                                 return 1;
00504                         }
00505                 }
00506         }
00507 
00508         free(command_line);
00509         return 0;
00510 }
